content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Furnace at position (x)
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace (position x1)

### Coal extraction point at position (y)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position y1)

### Iron plate production facility at position (z)
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace (position z1) that processes iron ore into iron plates
- Assembling machine (position z2) that crafts iron gear wheels using iron plates
- Inserter (position a) that puts iron plates into the assembling machine
- Beltgroup (position b) that connects the furnace at position z1 to the assembling machine at position z2

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors related to crafting due to insufficient resources
- Ensure you have enough raw materials in your inventory before attempting to craft items. For example, iron plates are required to craft iron gear wheels.

### Errors when using extraction but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting to place it.
